select last_insert_id()
insert into lego_address (gmt_create, gmt_modify, full_name, tel, full_address, address_detail, user_id) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update lego_address set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_address = #{fullAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_detail = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, full_name, tel, full_address, address_detail, user_id from lego_address where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, full_name, tel, full_address, address_detail, user_id from lego_address
